member.name: NET_ADDRESS_INFO
member.summary: The NET_ADDRESS_INFO structure contains IP address information returned by the function.

member.name: NET_ADDRESS_INFO.Format
member.summary: The format of the network address in the union in this structure. This member is an enumeration value from the enumeration declared in the Iphlpapi.h header file.

member.name: NET_ADDRESS_INFO.NamedAddress
member.summary: A DNS named address and port.

member.name: NET_ADDRESS_INFO.NamedAddress.Address
member.summary: Type: WCHAR[DNS_MAX_NAME_BUFFER_LENGTH]A DNS name formatted as a NULL-terminated wide character string. The maximum length of this string is the DNS_MAX_NAME_BUFFER_LENGTH constant defined in the Windns.h header file.

member.name: NET_ADDRESS_INFO.NamedAddress.Port
member.summary: Type: WCHAR[6]The network port formatted as a NULL-terminated wide character string.

member.name: NET_ADDRESS_INFO.Ipv4Address
member.summary: An IPv4 address represented as a SOCKADDR_IN structure.

member.name: NET_ADDRESS_INFO.Ipv6Address
member.summary: An IPv6 address represented as a SOCKADDR_IN6 structure.

member.name: NET_ADDRESS_INFO.IpAddress
member.summary: An IPv4 or IPv6 address represented as a SOCKADDR structure.
